fields.name: transactionDate
fields.description: When did this transaction take place? Please use YYYY-MM-DD format.
fields.title: Transaction date

fields.name: currency
fields.description: The currency used in amounts. Use the three-digit currency code from [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217)
fields.title: Currency

fields.name: value
fields.description: The total value of this transaction.
fields.title: Value

fields.name: valueDate
fields.description: The date that this value was set (to allow historical currency conversion). The date must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).
fields.title: Value date

fields.name: provider
fields.description: The organisation identifier of the provider of transaction funds.
fields.title: Provider

fields.name: recipient
fields.description: The organisation identifier of the recipient of transaction funds.
fields.title: Recipient

fields.name: dateModified
fields.description: When information about this transaction was last updated.
fields.title: Last modified
